an10.3:1.2: avippatisare asati avippatisaravipannassa hatupanisam hoti pamojjam;
an10.3:1.3: pamojje asati pamojjavipannassa hatupanisa hoti piti;
an10.3:1.4: pitiya asati pitivipannassa hatupanisa hoti passaddhi;
an10.3:1.5: passaddhiya asati passaddhivipannassa hatupanisam hoti sukham;
an10.3:1.6: sukhe asati sukhavipannassa hatupaniso hoti sammasamadhi;
an10.3:1.7: sammasamadhimhi asati sammasamadhivipannassa hatupanisam hoti yathabhutananadassanam;
an10.3:1.8: yathabhutananadassane asati yathabhutananadassanavipannassa hatupaniso hoti nibbidavirago;
an10.3:1.9: nibbidavirage asati nibbidaviragavipannassa hatupanisam hoti vimuttinanadassanam.
an10.3:1.10: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, rukkho sakhapalasavipanno. Tassa papatikapi na paripurim gacchati, tacopi … pheggupi … saropi na paripurim gacchati.
an10.3:1.11: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, dussilassa silavipannassa hatupaniso hoti avippatisaro;
an10.3:2.1: Silavato, bhikkhave, silasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippatisaro;
an10.3:2.2: avippatisare sati avippatisarasampannassa upanisasampannam hoti pamojjam;
an10.3:2.3: pamojje sati pamojjasampannassa upanisasampanna hoti piti;
an10.3:2.4: pitiya sati pitisampannassa upanisasampanna hoti passaddhi;
an10.3:2.5: passaddhiya sati passaddhisampannassa upanisasampannam hoti sukham;
an10.3:2.6: sukhe sati sukhasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammasamadhi;
an10.3:2.7: sammasamadhimhi sati sammasamadhisampannassa upanisasampannam hoti yathabhutananadassanam;
an10.3:2.8: yathabhutananadassane sati yathabhutananadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidavirago;
an10.3:2.9: nibbidavirage sati nibbidaviragasampannassa upanisasampannam hoti vimuttinanadassanam.
an10.3:2.10: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, rukkho sakhapalasasampanno. Tassa papatikapi paripurim gacchati, tacopi … pheggupi … saropi paripurim gacchati.
an10.3:2.11: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, silavato silasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippatisaro;
